text: Sándor Barcs (10 November 1912 – 7 January 2010) was a Hungarian journalist, politician, sports executive and amateur footballer. He was a member of the National Assembly of Hungary from 16 September 1947 to 1 May 1990. He was the acting President of UEFA from 7 July 1972 to 15 March 1973. == References == Category:1912 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Hungarian journalists Category:Hungarian politicians Category:Hungarian footballers Category:Hungarian businesspeople Category:Presidents of UEFA
title: Sándor Barcs
